verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥רַע <WH7489> displeased אֶל־ <WH413> about יוֹנָ֖ה <WH3124> Jonah רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> adversity גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> greatly וַיִּ֖חַר <WH2734> and he was very angry לֽוֹ׃

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <WH6419> And he prayed אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> God וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> and said אָנָּ֤ה <WH577> I pray יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> was not זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this דְבָרִ֗י <WH1697> [was] not this my saying עַד־ <WH5704> while הֱיוֹתִי֙ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> concerning אַדְמָתִ֔י <WH127> land עַל־ <WH5921> concerning כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> order קִדַּ֖מְתִּי <WH6923> before לִבְרֹ֣חַ <WH1272> fled תַּרְשִׁ֑ישָׁה <WH8659> unto Tarshish כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> for I knew כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you אֵֽל־ <WH410> God חַנּ֣וּן <WH2587> that thou [art] a gracious וְרַח֔וּם <WH7349> and merciful אֶ֤רֶךְ <WH750> slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <WH639> to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> and of great חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> kindness וְנִחָ֖ם <WH5162> and repentest עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הָרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> thee of the evil

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Therefore now O LORD קַח־ <WH3947> take נָ֥א <WH4994> please אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> I beseech thee my life מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> than כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ט֥וֹב <WH2896> from me for [it is] better מוֹתִ֖י <WH4194> for me to die מֵחַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> than to live ס
וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הַהֵיטֵ֖ב <WH3190> Doest thou well חָ֥רָה <WH2734> to be angry לָֽךְ׃

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> went out יוֹנָה֙ <WH3124> So Jonah מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat מִקֶּ֣דֶם <WH6924> on the east side לָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַיַּעַשׂ֩ <WH6213> and there made ל֨וֹ שָׁ֜ם <WH8033> There סֻכָּ֗ה <WH5521> him a booth וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat תַּחְתֶּ֙יהָ֙ <WH8478> under בַּצֵּ֔ל <WH6738> under it in the shadow עַ֚ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he יִרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> till he might see מַה־ <WH4100> what יִּהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> happen בָּעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> what would become of the city

וַיְמַ֣ן <WH4487> prepared יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> And the LORD אֱ֠לֹהִים <WH430> God קִיקָי֞וֹן <WH7021> a gourd וַיַּ֣עַל ׀ <WH5927> and made [it] to come up מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> over לְיוֹנָ֗ה <WH3124> over Jonah לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> to be a צֵל֙ <WH6738> that it might be a shadow עַל־ <WH5921> about רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> over his head לְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> to deliver ל֖וֹ מֵרָֽעָת֑וֹ <WH7451> him from his grief וַיִּשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> glad יוֹנָ֛ה <WH3124> So Jonah עַל־ <WH5921> over הַקִּֽיקָי֖וֹן <WH7021> of the gourd שִׂמְחָ֥ה <WH8056> glad גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> aloud

וַיְמַ֤ן <WH4487> prepared הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> But God תּוֹלַ֔עַת <WH8438> a worm בַּעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> rose הַשַּׁ֖חַר <WH7837> when the morning לַֽמָּחֳרָ֑ת <WH4283> the next day וַתַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> and it smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַקִּֽיקָי֖וֹן <WH7021> the gourd וַיִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> that it withered

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become כִּזְרֹ֣חַ <WH2224> did arise הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> And it came to pass when the sun וַיְמַ֨ן <WH4487> prepared אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> that God ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> wind קָדִים֙ <WH6921> east חֲרִישִׁ֔ית <WH2759> a vehement וַתַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> beat הַשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <WH8121> and the sun עַל־ <WH5921> and רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head יוֹנָ֖ה <WH3124> of Jonah וַיִּתְעַלָּ֑ף <WH5968> that he fainted וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> and wished אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> in himself לָמ֔וּת <WH4191> to die וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said ט֥וֹב <WH2896> [It is] better מוֹתִ֖י <WH4191> to die מֵחַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> than to live

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹנָ֔ה <WH3124> to Jonah הַהֵיטֵ֥ב <WH3190> Doest thou well חָרָֽה־ <WH2734> to be angry לְךָ֖ עַל־ <WH5921> about הַקִּֽיקָי֑וֹן <WH7021> gourd וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> said הֵיטֵ֥ב <WH3190> I do well חָֽרָה־ <WH2734> to be angry לִ֖י עַד־ <WH5704> even מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> [even] unto death

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You חַ֙סְתָּ֙ <WH2347> Thou hast had pity עַל־ <WH5921> on הַקִּ֣יקָי֔וֹן <WH7021> on the gourd אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> did not עָמַ֥לְתָּ <WH5998> for the which thou hast not laboured בּ֖וֹ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cause גִדַּלְתּ֑וֹ <WH1431> neither madest it grow שֶׁבִּן־ <WH1121> afflicted לַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> night הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> came וּבִן־ <WH1121> afflicted לַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> night אָבָֽד׃ <WH6> and perished

וַֽאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אָח֔וּס <WH2347> And should not I spare עַל־ <WH5921> and נִינְוֵ֖ה <WH5210> Nineveh הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> that great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> wherein are בָּ֡הּ הַרְבֵּה֩ <WH7235> more מִֽשְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <WH6240> ten רִבּ֜וֹ <WH7239> thousand אָדָ֗ם <WH120> persons אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָדַע֙ <WH3045> that cannot discern בֵּין־ <WH996> between יְמִינ֣וֹ <WH3225> between their right hand לִשְׂמֹאל֔וֹ <WH8040> and their left hand וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> beast רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> and [also] much
